code: function fade(){var observer=new IntersectionObserver(function(entries){entries.forEach(function(entry){console.log(entry);if(entry.isIntersecting){entry.target.classList.add("show");}else{entry.target.classList.remove("show");}});});var hiddenElements=document.querySelectorAll(".hidden");hiddenElements.forEach(function(el){return observer.observe(el);});}export default fade;
